mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.line_name AS lineName, t3.name AS programName FROM bu_repair_plan_year_detail t1 LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_line t2 ON t2.line_id = t1.line_id LEFT JOIN bu_repair_program t3 ON t3.id = t1.program_id WHERE t1.year_plan_id = #{id} ORDER BY t1.train_index

SELECT t1.*, t4.tp_name AS middlePlanTemplateName, t5.tp_name AS hightPlanTemplateName, t2.name AS depotName, t6.name AS workshopName, NVL(t3.process_status, '未发起') AS wfStatus, t3.process_candidate FROM bu_repair_plan_year t1 LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_depot t2 ON t2.id = t1.depot_id LEFT JOIN wf_biz_status t3 ON t3.business_key = t1.id LEFT JOIN bu_tp_repair_plan t4 ON t4.id = t1.middle_plan_template LEFT JOIN bu_tp_repair_plan t5 ON t5.id = t1.hight_plan_template LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop t6 ON t6.id = t1.workshop_id
AND t1.title LIKE '%'||#{queryVO.title}||'%'
AND ( t3.process_status = '未发起' OR t3.process_status IS NULL )
AND t3.process_status = '已结束'
AND ( t3.process_status != '未发起' AND t3.process_status != '已结束' AND t3.process_status IS NOT NULL )
ORDER BY t1.year DESC, t1.first_time DESC

SELECT t1.*, t4.tp_name AS middlePlanTemplateName, t5.tp_name AS hightPlanTemplateName, t2.name AS depotName, t6.name AS workshopName, NVL(t3.process_status, '未发起') AS wfStatus, t3.process_candidate FROM bu_repair_plan_year t1 LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_depot t2 ON t2.id = t1.depot_id LEFT JOIN wf_biz_status t3 ON t3.business_key = t1.id LEFT JOIN bu_tp_repair_plan t4 on t4.id = t1.middle_plan_template LEFT JOIN bu_tp_repair_plan t5 on t5.id = t1.hight_plan_template LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop t6 ON t6.id = t1.workshop_id WHERE t1.id = #{id}
